text: Michelle Phillips (born Holly Michelle Gilliam, June 4, 1944) is an American singer, songwriter and actress. She is best known for being in the musical group The Mamas & the Papas. In the 1990s, she played Abby Malone on Beverly Hills, 90210. Phillips was born in Long Beach, California. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American songwriters Category:American pop singers Category:Singers from California Category:Actors from Long Beach, California Category:1944 births Category:Living people
title: Michelle Phillips
